title: Blood Green
description: The three worlds have collided and are coming to an end. Zayn and Nikole face off for the final battle with Haydar and Leigh in a match to the death.Who will come out alive, and who will come out in the afterlife?Good does not always triumph over evil, and in the Algula world, that is even more true.Life as they know it is forever changed when heads roll.Will Adara's child survive after Haydar has taken her prisoner? Will Alec's death go avenged?What will happen to Nasir now that Leigh is here?Blood Green, because all good things come to an end.
author: Ashley Nemer
